Hi, there!

Welcome to my portfolio! I hope you like it. Send me a message and tell me what you think!

What I do

I study Electrical Engineering in Alexandria University, EG. But mainly I'm interested in web development and I'm working on becoming a full-stack JavaScript web developer; by enrolling in Coursera Specializations, working on real life projects as a freelancer, building projects on Free Code Camp, and peer programming with friends from all over the world!

P.S. I program robots that dive and discover underwater environments which is pretty cool !
